content: Hello there :)! I am an Atmospheric Science Ph.D. student at the University of Washington and also a NextGen Fellow. My research focuses on MJO-ENSO interaction from a physical mechanism perspective and I mostly work with observations (satellites + in-situ). I work under the supervision of Prof. Shuyi S. Chen and at NCAR with @Judith Berner . I will be in Boulder for 2 months using CESM2 outputs and I will appreciate any help if I run into python coding issues. Happy to chat about my exciting research :)
